Next up, Jaime Anderson tells me, they'll be making-over a pit bull in the wake of perpetually gauche Dwaine Caraway 's weekend spent buddying up to noted animal abuser and convicted felon Michael Vick . She writes: This will be more of an "image' makeover, but we plan to parade a pit around in a pink tutu and show how "vicious' they really are( not)!
